channel.title: Hi, I need some basic help for hosting a server
channel.description: I have looked on Yong Min's server help and downloaded EasyRSC source 1.1. I have looked through all of the information. But i cant find anything on HOW to host the server so that it is running online. Sorry, Im a noob but could someone help me out?

item.title: Hi, I need some basic help for hosting a server
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

Sparkz100:

I am using compile server. It says taskkill is not recognized as an internal or external command.

If you’re on windows, it most likely means your System32, or SysWOW64(if you’re on a 64 bit version) isn’t in your PATH environmental variable.

Read full topic

item.title: Hi, I need some basic help for hosting a server
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

Sparkz100:

Just run compile?? Thats all??

After changing any java file, you must compile to see the changes, so compile then run.

Read full topic

item.source: Hi, I need some basic help for hosting a server

item.title: Hi, I need some basic help for hosting a server
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

Open Server.java and change ‘localhost’ to your internal IP (such as 192.168.1.100) and then port forward your router so 43594 (TCP) is pointed to your internal IP. You then change the clients IP (in settings.ini) to your external IP so other people can connect. That’s the basics anyway.

Dont forget to compile afterwards

Read full topic
item.source: Hi, I need some basic help for hosting a server

item.title: Hi, I need some basic help for hosting a server
item.dc:creator: @roflcopterofl roflcopterofl
item.description:
@roflcopterofl wrote:

Sparkz100:

I have done that. So now people who download the client can connect? Or do i require some software to host the network, like hamachi?

Nope your all set. You just have to make sure your server is on and people will be able to connect. Good luck!

Read full topic
